title: The World famous Cathedral of Chatres: miracle of the 11th century
brief_description: A study of the famous gothic Cathedral of Chatres noted for its wealth of sculpture and magnificent stained glass windows. The film includes detailed studies of statuary and architectural features of the cathedral.
